title: Carlo Ancelotti - Wikipedia
snippet: Following rivals Barcelona's 4–2 defeat to Girona on 4 May, Ancelotti's Real Madrid clinched the league title mathematically; Real Madrid had defeated Cadíz 3–0 the previous day. With his twelfth title for the club overall, he overtook Zidane as the manager with the second–most title ...

title: Ancelotti, 13 titles with Real Madrid
snippet: In his two spells at our club, the Italian coach has now won 13 titles: 3 Champions Leagues, 2 Club World Cups, 2 European Super Cups, 2 LaLigas, 2 Copas del Rey and 2 Spanish Super Cups.

title: Carlo Ancelotti becomes Real Madrid's most successful manager - ESPN
snippet: In two spells in charge at Madrid ... lifted three Champions League trophies, two LaLiga titles, two Copa del Reys, two Spanish Supercopas, three UEFA Super Cups, two Club World Cups, and now the Intercontinental Cup...

title: Every Trophy Carlo Ancelotti Won at Real Madrid
snippet: Carlo Ancelotti (center) won three Champions League titles with Real Madrid.

title: Carlo Ancelotti Lists Nine of the Best Real Madrid Players He Managed
snippet: Carlo Ancelotti is the only manager to win five Champions League trophies.
